normalized: kiryuu, who had placed his lips against murasaki's, suddenly bent his knees and crumpled down on the spot.

name: ingrid
normalized: what are you screwing around for?!
ingrid, who had shortened her distance from them, swung her longsword.
murasaki silently jumped out of the way and dodged her blade, but kiryuu, who had collapsed then and there…
at the same time that it was cut, kiryuu's body was engulfed in black flames, and burned up in the blink of an eye.
and with that, not even glancing at kiryuu, who was burning away like dry wood brought near a fire, ingrid pointed the tip of her blade at murasaki, whom she had failed to kill.
the lips of murasaki, who was illuminated by the black flames that engulfed kiryuu, had lifted up at the sides, as if pleased by the fate of the man who had defiled and toyed with her.

name: murasaki
normalized: i see my corpse is burning up… kuku, that's quite the rare experience, isn't it?
ingrid knit her brows in puzzlement for just a moment.

name: ingrid
normalized: no way, you possessed the taimanin?!

name: murasaki
normalized: i did say we were going to combine, didn't i?
now clearly making a faint smile, murasaki looked back at the brown-skinned female knight.
murasaki's body lurched diagonally, as though she had been struck by vertigo or something.

name: murasaki
normalized: as i expected, manipulating your body is exhausting… i'm putting you in charge.
i'll leave the rest to you, murasaki.
ingrid prepared to use her longsword, and charged at murasaki, who changed her expression in bewilderment as if she were performing a one-woman show.
murasaki jumped directly backward, and easily dodged the path of the sharp sword as it cut through the air.
unexpectedly, a familiar man's voice echoed inside murasaki's head.
it was the voice of none other than the man who had now been reduced to cinders.

name: kiryuu
normalized: i have now become, as it were, a life form of mere consciousness, existing within the tumour implanted in your body.
this means that the tumour is my new brain.

name: kiryuu
normalized: （essentially, it's a sub-brain, such as can be seen in large reptiles―a nerve ganglion which controls the muscles, and supports the normal functions of the brain― one could even say it's like an organ, but it's not just that!

name: kiryuu
normalized: （i have, as it were, been born again as a higher order of being, a new life form possessing the minds of two people in one body.
rejoice, murasaki… or, should i say, other me!

name: kiryuu
normalized: the antipathy that arose when you started listening to me means that you're worried about what's to come, but it'll be fine!
kiryuu's cheerful speed-talking resounded in a loud echo that she couldn't defend against, as if it were streaming directly from a speaker embedded in her head.

name: kiryuu
normalized: （now, i'm sending the tissue of the tumour all around your body, further accelerating your astounding natural regeneration functions, and making you recover from your accumulated fatigue and damage as i erode your body!

name: kiryuu
normalized: （with this, you'll be able to turn our potential as a life form into anti-demon power, just like that.
naturally, that's why your body is light!
easily dodging ingrid's slash attack, which was unleashed with lightning speed, murasaki's face once again formed a smile.

name: murasaki
normalized: from here on, leave all the details of your body to me, murasaki♪

name: ingrid
normalized: don't screw around in the middle of a fight!
without even a hair having been touched by ingrid's longsword, which abruptly changed direction in the air and came back at her, murasaki called out to kiryuu in her mind.

name: murasaki
normalized: （but, even if i keep dodging like this, i won't make any progress unarmed!

name: kiryuu
normalized: i was fully prepared in case something like this happened!

name: ingrid
normalized: in that case… can you avoid this, taimanin?!
ingrid readied her longsword horizontally and charged, aiming for the moment that murasaki landed.
directly in front of murasaki, the strike of ingrid―who attacked like a fired arrow, unifying her own body with the black flames―was…
ingrid's face became wide-eyed in shock.
at point-blank range, the sword clad in black flame had…
murasaki had “caught” the sword of the female knight from hell.
with the handle of a gigantic axe, which had appeared in the palm of her hand, like magic…

name: ingrid
normalized: kuh… is this frivolous action kiryuu's doing…?!

name: kiryuu
normalized: in case something like this happened, i crammed metallic cells into the tumour in advance!
this is the ace up my sleeve!
grasping the handle tightly once more, murasaki looked up at the gigantic axe that had forced back ingrid's sword, as if to confirm this reunion with the weapon she was familiar with.
a long, thick handle which only murasaki could wield.
a blade that cut, broke and pulverized all at the same time, with thickness that a sword or a knife could never attain…
as long as murasaki had this giant axe, which could channel, and strike with, all of her anti-demon power…

name: kiryuu
normalized: （i'm honoured that you like it, but…!
kiryuu's tense voice echoed in the mind of murasaki, who had forced ingrid back with her superhuman elbow strength.

name: kiryuu
normalized: it would be a problem if we were to linger here, and have edwin black appear as well.

name: kiryuu
normalized: （that's right… i would advise dealing a blow to her here, and promptly taking the opportunity to escape…）

name: murasaki
normalized: this female knight is unbelievably strong…!
with its speed and weight, ingrid's sword had surpassed every enemy she had fought so far.

name: kiryuu
normalized: （“only my asagi-sama could win against someone like this,” huh…?

name: ingrid
normalized: hmph… using even more ridiculous techniques won't amuse me either.
i'll settle this with the next blow!
keeping her distance, murasaki faced the female knight of hell, who stood ready to inflict a deadly blow, and prepared to use her big axe again.
pleased that the person on the other side of this defensive battle had finally shifted to counterattacking, ingrid raised her sword up high in order to slaughter her opponent…
murasaki and ingrid kicked off the ground simultaneously.
they both closed the distance in an instant, and just before they crossed paths, they put all their strength into their respective weapons, and unleashed them.
murasaki screamed the words that were in the back of her mind.
in a flash, the big axe rushed towards ingrid.
so did countless tentacles, which had been released from murasaki's body…
as well as the female knight, the fired tentacles flew towards everything around them, indiscriminately spreading a storm of destruction.
although she had blocked the first attack, even ingrid was unable to defend against the ferocious assault of the infinite attacking tentacles.
the tentacles, which had turned into battering rams, were growing even wilder, and engulfing everything, even the stage of the chaos arena, in a mixer of destruction.
the tentacles' brutality towards their surroundings increased in violence even further.
now, the female knight of hell, who mustered a groan, could do nothing but continue defending against the tentacles' attacks and the pellets of debris.
even murasaki herself, who dealt the superlatively brutal attack, doubted her own eyes due to the scene in front of her.
a storm of agonized cries swallowed up the surrounding objects, people, demons, and everything.

name: kiryuu
normalized: this is our first cooperative work, murasaki!

name: murasaki
normalized: t, tentacle… what are you making me say?!
amid the storm that the tentacles created, murasaki ran through the chaos arena, which had transformed into a literal scene of chaos.
by the time that armed reinforcements came running, pushing their way through the panicked audience and attempting to control the situation…
the figures of murasaki and sakura were nowhere to be seen.
several days after the chaos arena, which had just been reconstructed, collapsed once again――
there was a figure moving through a downtown back street, where the pedestrian traffic had petered out, in order to avoid public notice.
murasaki proceeded soundlessly through the darkness with slow movements, while looking around vigilantly.
not even the slightest trace of having been blown off by the amputation shackles remained on the limbs of sakura, whom she carried on her back.
having escaped from the chaos arena, taking advantage of the confusion, murasaki had been hiding for the last few days in a nomad refuge, which kiryuu had prepared in order to get past surveillance.
having finished treating sakura's injuries, murasaki and kiryuu were now taking advantage of the darkness to escape the city controlled by nomad and edwin black.
sakura's body, which had been pleasantly heating murasaki's back, twitched, along with some sighs.
murasaki's short, whispered words were filled with relief.

name: sakura
normalized: why am i on murasaki's… uu, my body's kind of heavy…

name: murasaki
normalized: we're going to escape from this city before the sun rises.

name: sakura
normalized: i was caught… in the arena, uhh… why are you carrying me on your back…?
her memories in disarray, sakura squirmed restlessly on murasaki's back like she was still half-asleep.

name: murasaki
normalized: we escaped from the chaos arena.
you can walk already, can't you?

name: sakura
normalized: just a bit longer, like this…
murasaki shook her back, trying to drop sakura, and sakura wrapped her arms and legs, which had become the way they were before, around her body.

name: sakura
normalized: wah, wait, don't throw me off, 'cause my body's really languid all over.
murasaki looked back at sakura, who had suddenly raised a hysterical voice.

name: sakura
normalized: i wonder if it's my imagination.
it was only a little, but there was some youki just now…
having been dropped by murasaki, sakura stood up while rubbing her rear.

name: sakura
normalized: murasaki, carry me on your baack!
leaving sakura behind, murasaki leapt straight up.
her long, dark-blue hair soared from the roof of one building to another in the blink of an eye.
sakura similarly soared, chasing after murasaki.
before long, the two taimanin had completely melted into the dim light of daybreak, and disappeared.
